price: 17. Po to bus tarta (jiems): „Tai yra tai, ką jūs neigdavote.“
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
